::Aerotaur::
    He looks up from his contemplation now that Nightlight had emerged from 
the CR chamber.  "You okay?"  He was still a little groggy from his sitting.  
He stands up and walks over to her.  "I'm sorry.  I should've been here 
instead of off trying to save some stranger."
